department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

remark.ch: 醫學工程與資訊科學組

goal.en: Introduction to the fundamentals of data structures using C++
goal.ch: C++程式語言數據結構的基礎介紹

content.en: 1.C/C++ fundamentals (1 week)；2.Variables and basic types (1 week); 3.Strings, vectors, arrays (1 week);4.Expressions (1 week)；5.Statements (1 week)；6. Functions (1 week); 7.Classes (1 week); 8.IO library (1 week); 9.Sequential containers (1 week); 10.Generic algortihms (1 week);11.Associative containers (1 week); 12.Dynamic memory (1 week); 13.Object-oriented programming (4 week); 14.Midterm (1 week)；15.Final Exam (1 week)
content.ch: 1.C/C++ 基礎介紹 (1週)；2.變數和基本類型 (1週)；3.字串陣列矩陣(1週)；4.計算式(1週)；5.敘述式(1週)；6.函式(1週)；7.類別(1週)；8.輸入輸出(1週)；9.序列式容器(1週)；10.通用演算法(1週)；11.關聯容器(1週)；12.動態資料 (1週)；13.物件導向程式設計(4週)；14.期中考(1週)；15.期末考(1週)

textbook.en: C++ Primer, 5th ed, SB Lippman, J Lajoie, BE Moo
textbook.ch: C++ Primer 5th Edition 中文版，作者： Stanley B. Lippman, Josée Lajoie, Barbara E. Moo，譯者： 黃銘偉， 出版社：碁峰

grading.ch: 紙筆/程式作業 30% 期中考 30% 期末考 30% 出席率及課堂表現 10%

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning

ch.competency: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en: Department:Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.
Department:Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.
Department:Joint Science Program、Minor-Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Double Major-Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限生醫科學與工程學系。年級:限二年級。
系所:限生醫科學與工程學系。
系所:限理學院學士班、輔系-生醫科學與工程學系、雙主修-生醫科學與工程學系。
